issue.title: [Python] Expose GroupBy function.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13688](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13688). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The hash_aggregate functions are in `pyarrow.compute`, but they're not directly callable. Looks like GroupBy is unavailable in Python.
